Add subsystems or update their data

Source: R/model_modifications.R
addSubsystem.Rd

The function allows you to add one or more subsystems to a model. When providing the ID of an already existing subsystem, you can use this function to update the subsystem's name.

Usage

addSubsystem(model, id, name = NA)

Arguments

model

Model of class ModelOrg

id

Character vector with subsystem IDs

name

Character vector for subsystem names

Examples

fpath <- system.file("extdata", "e_coli_core.xml", package="cobrar")
mod <- readSBMLmod(fpath)
mod <- addSubsystem(mod, id = "Bifidoshunt",
                    name = "glucose fermentation to acetate and lactate (Bifidobacteria)")
